channel.title: Rune-Company Development
channel.description:
Hello and Welcome to Rune-Company Development! We are trying to make a Good,Stable,Economic Server!
Server Base: Project-Insanity (Eurdora-World V2.0)
Server Features
Game updates -Faction Rewards -VIP Status. -Premium Status. -Changing Game Option! -Fully Working Clan Chat -X Logging Fixed -Following Disabled -Switching Gamesframes -Shops for VIP's and Premium's -Dubble EXP Weekends always!
Skills - Perfect runecrafting - Essence Mining - Abby Runecrafting - Hunter (butterfly's) - Hunter Items have correct prices - Full stall thieving! - Full farming - Full crafting - Full Mining - Full smithing - Full Herblore - Full slayer - Full cooking - Full Fletching - Fishing (little issue)Bait fishing - Mage prayer protects from dragon breaths now. Not working - Woodcutting - Firemaking - Agility
Minigames - Full Pest control - Pest control Exchange - Full Barrows - Barrows Reward Chest - Ice Cave Miningame - Ice Cave Minigame Exchange - Investement System - Investement Rewards - Full godwars with drops! - Godwars Map! - Fully dueling - Full tzhaar fight pits
Items - New food added - Purple sweets added - Crossbows added - Skillcapes Emotes! - Silverlight 100 charges special! - All Dupes Fixed! - Bank space added
NPC - Kbd Correct Attack and hits! - Red Dragons added - Fully working npc and player dialogues! - ALL Npc's have correct Walking,Attacking,Dieing emotes!
Places - Dark world added - Larxus lands added - Locus dungeon - Brimhaven dungeon - Slayer tower - Dark beast - Dagannoths
PK - PK System - PK Drops - PK interface - Perfect Rushing - MultiBarrage on players added
[b]Pictures[/b]
ABBYS [img]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/abbys99def.png[/img] COOKING [img]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/cooking99.png[/img] FISHING [img]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/fishing.png[/img]
[b]Gifs[/b]Let them load
BANK DEPOSIT [img]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/Vids0027.gif[/img] ALCHING [img]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/Vids0031.gif[/img]
[img]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/Vids0002.gif[/img][img]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/Vids0003.gif[/img][img]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/Vids0004.gif[/img][img]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/Vids0005.gif[/img][img]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/Vids0006.gif[/img][img]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/Vids0007.gif[/img][img]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/Vids0008.gif[/img][img]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/Vids0009.gif[/img][img]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/Vids0010.gif[/img][img]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/Vids0011.gif[/img][img]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/Vids0012.gif[/img][img]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/Vids0013.gif[/img][img]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/Vids0014.gif[/img][img]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/Vids0015.gif[/img][img]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/Vids0016.gif[/img][img]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/Vids0017.gif[/img][img]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/Vids0018.gif[/img][img]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/Vids0019.gif[/img][img]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/Vids0020.gif[/img][img]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/Vids0023.gif[/img][img]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/Vids0025.gif[/img]

item.title: Rune-Company Development
item.dc:creator: @FtwCScape FtwCScape
item.description:
@FtwCScape wrote:

Hello and Welcome to Rune-Company Development!
We are trying to make a Good,Stable,Economic Server!

Server Base: Project-Insanity (Eurdora-World V2.0)

Server Features

Game updates
-Faction Rewards
-VIP Status.
-Premium Status.
-Changing Game Option!
-Fully Working Clan Chat
-X Logging Fixed
-Following Disabled
-Switching Gamesframes
-Shops for VIP’s and Premium’s
-Dubble EXP Weekends always!

Skills

  • Perfect runecrafting
  • Essence Mining
  • Abby Runecrafting
  • Hunter (butterfly’s)
  • Hunter Items have correct prices
  • Full stall thieving!
  • Full farming
  • Full crafting
  • Full Mining
  • Full smithing
  • Full Herblore
  • Full slayer
  • Full cooking
  • Full Fletching
  • Fishing (little issue)Bait fishing
  • Mage prayer protects from dragon breaths now.
    Not working
  • Woodcutting
  • Firemaking
  • Agility

Minigames

  • Full Pest control
  • Pest control Exchange
  • Full Barrows
  • Barrows Reward Chest
  • Ice Cave Miningame
  • Ice Cave Minigame Exchange
  • Investement System
  • Investement Rewards
  • Full godwars with drops!
  • Godwars Map!
  • Fully dueling
  • Full tzhaar fight pits

Items

  • New food added
  • Purple sweets added
  • Crossbows added
  • Skillcapes Emotes!
  • Silverlight 100 charges special!
  • All Dupes Fixed!
  • Bank space added

NPC

  • Kbd Correct Attack and hits!
  • Red Dragons added
  • Fully working npc and player dialogues!
  • ALL Npc’s have correct Walking,Attacking,Dieing emotes!

Places

  • Dark world added
  • Larxus lands added
  • Locus dungeon
  • Brimhaven dungeon
  • Slayer tower
  • Dark beast
  • Dagannoths

PK

  • PK System
  • PK Drops
  • PK interface
  • Perfect Rushing
  • MultiBarrage on players added
